name: Spirit Haven: Realm of Fate (Kevin O'Ryan)
name_original: Spirit Haven: Realm of Fate (Kevin O'Ryan)
description:
You are a spirit who had a tragic end to his life, thus bringing him to the Judgement Realm. Your mission is to crossover to Heaven, however, you need to complete a set of task to determine your fate!

Controls:

    Arrow Keys - Move/Select

    Enter - Start

    Z - Action/Next Dialog
